Encounter.Name: First Contact
Encounter.DescriptionText: While patrolling the edges of space, your forces have stumbled upon a wretched hive of scum and villainy: a Corsair base! The Corsairs have sent you this message:

Message.Text: You have come to the wrong place, SING. Turn back and forget you have been here. We will contact you ourselves when we need something.
Your subspace transmitter cracks in a strange noise. You get a feeling that you are not welcome here.
